title: Respond to Backup Withholding Notice
description: A business receives a notice from the IRS (CP2100) indicating that a contractor's name and TIN on a 1099-NEC do not match IRS records, and the business may need to start backup withholding.

tasks.description: Review the notice to identify the contractor with the mismatched information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the specific contractor in question.

tasks.description: Contact the contractor to request a new Form W-9 to obtain the correct information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reaches out to the contractor to resolve the discrepancy.

tasks.description: Update the business's records with the corrected information and advise on whether backup withholding is now required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the vendor file and confirms that backup withholding is not necessary once the information is corrected.
